title: Breakingviews - The Exchange: PBS CEO Paula Kerger
text:

description: (Reuters Breakingviews) - Streaming is upending the media landscape, including public television. Its funding model, local structure and social mandate make broadcaster PBS unlike any other U.S outlet. Its longest-serving boss, Paula Kerger, discusses the challenges and possibilities of the new era.
